snippet: After years of chasing Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic, Andy Murray joined the exclusive golden-age club of tennis with his victory at the United States Open on Monday.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column notes that when Andy Murray beat Novak Djokovic, 7-6 (10), 7-5, 2-6, 3-6, 6-2, in the longest US Open final in history, he became the first British man to win a Grand Slam tournament since 1936.
lead_paragraph: After years of chasing Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic, Andy Murray joined the exclusive golden-age club of tennis with his victory at the United States Open on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Clears His Grand Slam Hurdle
headline.seo: Andy Murray Clears Hurdle for Grand Slam Title
headline.main: Murray Clears His Grand Slam Hurdle
